pjv - Python JSON Validator
===========================

PJV helps validating and find erroneous line in JSON file.

Installation
------------

By using pip::

    pip install pjv

Example
-------

User works on task ``t1235``, he creates a task (script)::

  pho create t1235

Authors
-------

Contribution
------------

All contribution are greatly welcome :+1:
